overview.title: 欢迎使用 Manyverse ！
overview.description: 社交网络可以是简单的，中立的，非商业的和建立在朋友间的信任之上。这就是Manyverse所代表的，并且我们希望你也可以使它成为你的数字之家。新奇的SSB协议使这一切成为可能。

description.1_normal: Manyverse可以使用互联网连接，但是它不是
description.3_normal: 互联网。所有一切都在你的设备中。这就是说你可以在线下正常使用它！你的
description.4_bold: 数据内容都首先储存在你的设备上
description.5_normal: ，你可以在与朋友连接后与他们同步。

ios.1_normal: To connect with friends nearby and synchronize content, you can connect to the same
ios.3_normal: . To find new people on the internet, look for an invite code to a

default.1_normal: To connect with friends nearby and synchronize content, you can either: join the same
default.5_normal: . To find new people on the internet, look for an invite code to a

description.1_normal: 由于你的设备托管了你的社交网络，没有其他人可以代替你封禁或删除账号。只有你可以管理你的空间，通过
description.3_normal: 那些你不想在你设备上看到的。然后，你的朋友也可以选择屏蔽这些相同的账号。通过这样审核权被自然分散！

description.1_normal: 一旦你的内容与好友同步，他们的设备上就会有一份拷贝。因为他们可以在这之后下线，
description.3_normal: 你的内容从所有的设备上！这也是为什么我们选择使内容永久化。这也使社区成员们更加慎重考虑他们要发出的内容。
。我们还没有完全熟悉一切，且一些地方需要改进。在同步过程中，软件会出现冻结若干分钟的情况。请保持耐心！请告知我们你遇到的任何程序错误，同时在足够的时间和募捐下，我们可以做出一个非常棒的应用。

setup_account.title: Is this your first time?
setup_account.description: Do you want to create a new account, or would you like to restore your old account from a 24-word recovery phrase?

central.building_indexes:
Building database indexes...
This may take up to several minutes

empty.title: No messages
empty.description:
Write a diary to be
shared with friends later

empty.title: No conversations
empty.description:
Start a private conversation
with any of your friends

empty.title: No activity
empty.description:
When people mention or follow you,
they show up here

offline.title: Offline
offline.description:
Turn on some connection mode
or enjoy reading some existing content

connecting.title: Connecting
connecting.description:
Wait while the app is
attempting to connect to your peers

no_peers.title: No connections
no_peers.description:
Try syncing with people nearby
or use a server invite code

toasts.invite_rejected: Invite rejected. Are you sure it was correct?

client_initiated.title: Allow sign-in?
client_initiated.description:
Open {{room}}'s website to create invite links and manage members. Do you want to use Manyverse to sign in?

The room's ID is {{roomid}}

server_initiated.title: Allow sign-in?
server_initiated.description:
A web browser is requesting permission to identify you. Do you want to sign in to the server {{room}}?

Its ID is {{roomid}}

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth.description: Discover users nearby and connect with them using Bluetooth.

permission_request.title: Allow locating via Bluetooth?
permission_request.message: Manyverse needs to use Bluetooth to discover where you are ("coarse location") and what peers are around you.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Connect with friends in the same Local Area Network, in other words, friends using the same Wi-Fi.

servers.title: Internet servers
servers.description: Connect to a so-called 'Pub server' owned by some friend, containing the latest data from multiple accounts.

accessibility_label.connected: Open profile screen for this connected peer
accessibility_label.staged: Open profile screen for this suggested connection

follow_connect.label: Connect and follow
follow_connect.accessibility_label: Connect to this suggested peer then follow them

accessibility_label.peer: Disconnect from this peer and remove it from our database
accessibility_label.room: Disconnect from this room and remove it from our database
Remove this room from our database

manage_aliases.label: Manage my aliases
manage_aliases.accessibility_label: Manage my aliases in Room servers

room_sign_in.label: Sign into website
room_sign_in.accessibility_label: Open this room's website and sign into its dashboard, Button

room_share_invite.label: Share invite code
room_share_invite.accessibility_label: Share the invite code for this room

add.title: Add note
add.description: Write a private (just for yourself) note about this invite code. For example: "This is for Alice"

room.title: Invite code to an SSB Room
room.message: Join me in the SSB Room {{name}} by pasting this invite code in Manyverse:
room.dialog_note: Give this invite code to a friend

permission_request.title: Allow Manyverse to record audio?
permission_request.message: Manyverse needs access to your microphone so you can compose audio messages

content_warning.title: Content warning
content_warning.description: If your post contains sensitive topics, please add a short note to alert people of them.

image_caption.title: Caption
image_caption.description: Add some description of this picture, particularly for the visually impaired.

introduction.title:
Your account has
two parts to keep safe

description.1_normal: This is your account's posts, messages, pictures, likes and similar activity. To keep it safe against sudden loss, we use
description.5_normal: or other devices you own. There is
description.7_normal: , just use Manyverse often and your friends are backing you up!

description.1_normal: Your account's "fingerprint" is made up of a highly unique
description.3_normal: . This is a sequence of 24 words that unlocks your account.
description.5_normal: , because if anyone else has access to it, they can take control of your account.
description.7_normal: over it, since you and only you can recover your account!

notifications.new_conversation: This is a new private conversation

dialog_thanks.title: Thank you!
dialog_thanks.description:
Development of this app was supported by grants from {{sponsor1}} and {{sponsor2}}, and donations from:

**{{topBackers}}**, and [a hundred more backers]({{donateLink}}). Thanks!

alert_unsupported_dht.title: Unsupported type
alert_unsupported_dht.description: P2P Invites are no longer supported in Manyverse.

libraries.title: Third party libraries
libraries.description: Manyverse makes use of the following open source libraries and components. We want to thank the authors of these libraries and link to their websites for proper attribution.

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description:
You have chosen to stop
interacting with this account

no_self_messages.title: No messages
no_self_messages.description:
Write a diary which you can
share with friends later

no_messages.title: No messages
no_messages.description:
You don't yet have any data
from this account

remove_alias.description:
This action will remove the alias "{{alias}}" from the room server.

People won't be able to reach you any more using this alias.

no_servers.title: No servers
no_servers.description: To register an alias, you need to be a member of some SSB room server. Find one on the internet with the hashtag #ssbroom and make sure it supports aliases.

header.description:
Choose a room server where you would like to register a new alias link for yourself.

Aliases are web addresses that people can use to connect with you.

input_alias.description:
Submit your desired new alias to {{host}} as a single word in lowercase.

For example, if you want the alias "myname.{{host}}", write "myname" below.

failure.title: It didn't work
failure.alias_taken: The alias you submitted is already taken by some user.

instructions.title: Choose members
instructions.description:
Type in the names
of people to join the new chat

none_to_choose.title: No one
none_to_choose.description:
There is nobody in your
community with that name

practice.title: Practice
practice.header: Repeat it to confirm it is correct:

correct.title: Correct!
correct.description: Your account's identity is now secure because you know the recovery phrase.

incorrect.title: Incorrect
incorrect.description: Try again: write down your recovery phrase consisting of 24 words separated by whitespace.

correct.title: Welcome back!
correct.description:
Your account's identity is now restored.

Now, to restore your data, connect with friends that have interacted with you before, to redownload your data from them.

description.try_again: Try again by inserting your recovery phrase consisting of 24 words separated by whitespace.
description.overwrite_risk: There is already an account in the app, we cannot overwrite it. If you are sure you want to override, uninstall and re-install Manyverse to recover your account from a clean state.
description.too_short: There are some words missing. Your recovery phrase should be 24 words long.
description.too_long: There are too many words. Your recovery phrase should be exactly 24 words long.
description.wrong_length: Your recovery phrase should be exactly 24 words long.
description.generic: The recovery phrase you gave does not look like a valid identity generated by Manyverse.

header.1_normal: Carefully write down the following recovery phrase on a

show_follows.title: Show follow events
show_follows.subtitle: Show follow or block or unfollow cases on the public board
show_follows.accessibility_label: Toggle follow events on the public board

hops.title: Replication hops
hops.subtitle: How far out in the social graph should Manyverse download data; 1 is friends-only, 2 is friends-of-friends, etc. Caution: the higher this is, the more data is downloaded!

blobs_storage.title: Blobs storage limit
blobs_storage.subtitle: Automatically delete old images and blobs until they occupy at most this amount of storage on your device

restart_required.title: Restart required
restart_required.description: This setting will only enter into effect when you kill the app and restart Manyverse.

missing.title: Missing data
missing.description:
You don't yet have data
for the message known by the ID

blocked.title: Blocked thread
blocked.description:
You have chosen to block
the author of this thread

incompatible.title: Sorry
incompatible.description:
This app doesn't know how to process
and display this thread correctly

read_more.label: Read more
read_more.accessibility_label: Read more content in this thread
